file.name: openapi30.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: allOf of $ref and schema without type
  version: 1.0.0

paths:
  /all-of-no-type:
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: object response with allOf of $ref and schema without type
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  foo:
                    allOf:
                      - readOnly: true
                      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Foo'
# proper way would be this, because a schema must have a type property!
# https://stackoverflow.com/questions/51402156/how-to-declare-a-ref-property-as-readonly-in-openapi-swagger
#                  foo:
#                    readOnly: true
#                    allOf:
#                      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Foo'
components:
  schemas:

    Foo:
      type: object
      properties:
        foo:
          type: string

Error: buildIR: make ir: path "/all-of-no-type": get: responses: code 200: contents: application/json: generate schema: field foo: allOf: schema type mismatch:  and object
